name: Dice 1000 online
description: This game is a simulator of a board game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 2 or higher (DirectX 9.0c or higher must be installed). Processor: 1 GHz or faster Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 120 MB available space Sound Card: yes
